description:
Yuma’s mom got a role as an patissier, but the fact is, she’s not a good baker at all.
Ashibe brings Peppeppe to help Yuma’s mom become a better baker, but Yuma and Goma-chan knows how awful Yuma’s mom’s cooking is. 
Can they keep this a secret from Ashibe and Peppeppe?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ペッペッペッさんのケーキ教室
